      • getFullyQualifiedName

        @Nonnull
public String getFullyQualifiedName()
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Returns the fully qualified name of this action.

        The value should be the controller's full class name and the action's name joined by a period.
        Specified by:
        getFullyQualifiedName in interface Action
        Returns:
        the fully qualified name of this action.
